p: The effect of illumination time was investigated in the ranges of 10:14, 12:12 and 14:10 light and dark cycle for microalgae growth. For the effect of pH on microalgae growth, the culture medium was adjusted to three different pH levels 7, 8 and 9, using 1 M HCl and 1 M NaOH. The pH adjustment was carried before autoclaving the culture medium.
